name: My Holiday Revenge
description:
From the Creator of unfamous games like "Oh, My Planet!" and "I Hate Heroes", here's a new game for spending your summer in 2022... My Holiday Revenge!

The Story

It's summer, and it's really hot! You have worked a lot this year, and after so many sacrifices, you're finally able to relax and go on vacation. You just can't wait to spend time blissfully on the beach, in a famous place called "Fruit Heaven Chalet", where you'll be able to feast on your favorite fruit, the watermelon.

But luck isn't on your side this time... around Fruit Heaven Chalet, you find an infestation of Fire Spirits who, guided by their boss, have decided to ruin each villager's vacation by running around and burning people.

So what better way to take revenge on these hot little creatures than by using your beloved watermelons as a weapon of mass destruction.

Game Info

The genre of this game is similar to FPS Rogue-Like, so maybe it can give a little bit of motion sickness.

Game Mechanics

Eat Watermelon: Restores HP, Adds Seed Projectiles in your mouth

Shoot Seeds: Use the Right Trigger to Shoot Seeds.

Launch Watermelon: Enemies hit by watermelons take big Damages.

SuperWatermelon!: Like classic Watermelons, it gives HP if eaten, but MORE! If thrown to Enemies, it deals Damage but MORE!! And it also has AOE EFFECT!!!

The game has 2 Levels + a Tutorial (at first, I thought of creating 4 levels, but I didn't have enough time left sadly), and there are also mechanics where, if you pay with Gems dropped by enemies, you can Upgrade the power of Watermelons and Seeds, and the player will also be able to Level Up.

I hope you'll enjoy this game, and if you do, let me know! Have a nice summer and eat lots of Watermelons!

This Game is tested on Oculus Quest Standalone, i couldn't test properly the PCVR version of the game, anyway is using the OpenXR plugin.
